metadata.description: Childhood friends Chihiro and Keigo are living together under one roof. They're lovers, but they've only ever kissed once. To Chihiro, it hardly even feels like they're going out, and he's getting impatient! And on top of that, he suddenly has a rival!? It's ever-loyal Keigo and headstrong Chihiro's heart-pounding, heart-breaking LOVE!!
metadata.name: Doki Doki Crush
